thread.title: Challenge: Metal Musicians Take 24 Hours To Write & Record A Pop Song, This Is What They Came Up With [News]
thread.title_full: Challenge: Metal Musicians Take 24 Hours To Write & Record A Pop Song, This Is What They Came Up With [News]

title: Challenge: Metal Musicians Take 24 Hours To Write & Record A Pop Song, This Is What They Came Up With [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 7 hours ago 7 
Jared Dines from YouTube and his buddy Vince - also known as the former singer of Rest, Repose - recently invested 24 hours of their time to write and record a pop tune. 
The whole endeavor was inspired by the boys' acoustic cover of recent Suicide Silence tune " Doris ." 
Jared said: "We recently did a pop cover of a metal song and it got us wondering - as metalheads, can we actually write our own pop songs? So that's what we did, first time I ever wrote a pop song, this is what we came up with in about 24 hours. So, enjoy!" 
You can check out the tune below.
